Name: LAST_UPDATE_DATE
Comments: Who column: indicates the date and time of the last update of the row.

Name: LAST_UPDATED_BY
Comments: Who column: indicates the user who last updated the row.

Name: CREATION_DATE
Comments: Who column: indicates the date and time of the creation of the row.

Name: CREATED_BY
Comments: Who column: indicates the user who created the row.

Name: LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN
Comments: Who column: indicates the session login associated to the user who last updated the row.

Name: USER_JE_SOURCE_NAME
Comments: Journal entry source user defined name.

Name: LANGUAGE
Comments: Indicates the code of the language into which the contents of the translatable columns are translated.

Name: SOURCE_LANG
Comments: Indicates the code of the language in which the contents of the translatable columns were originally created.

Name: OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER
Comments: Used to implement optimistic locking. This number is incremented every time that the row is updated. The number is compared at the start and end of a transaction to detect whether another session has updated the row since it was queried.

Name: SEED_DATA_SOURCE
Comments: Source of seed data record. A value of 'BULK_SEED_DATA_SCRIPT' indicates that record was bulk loaded. Otherwise, specifies the name of the seed data file.

Name: ORA_SEED_SET1
Comments: Oracle internal use only. Indicates the edition-based redefinition (EBR) context of the row for SET1. Context values are Y or N.

Name: ORA_SEED_SET2
Comments: Oracle internal use only. Indicates the edition-based redefinition (EBR) context of the row for SET2. Context values are Y or N.
